event.title: was founded to be the seat of the newly formed Clay Co. in 1807

data.event: The town was founded to be the seat of the newly formed Clay Co. in 1807 on a 10-acre (4.0 ha) parcel near the Lower Goose Creek Salt Works.
The Greenville in Muhlenberg County had already preÃ«mpted that name, however, and it was changed to "Manchester" in December.
